title: Schema for Extracted Grundschutz-Check Data
description: A schema to hold the structured list of requirements extracted from the Grundschutz-Check document.

anforderungen.description: A list of all security requirements found in the document.

id.description: The full ID of the requirement, e.g., 'ISMS.1.A1'.

umsetzungserlaeuterung.description: The full text of the implementation explanation.

datumLetztePruefung.description: The date of the last check, in YYYY-MM-DD or DD.MM.YYYY format.
